resources.string: There is some problem with the Internet connection. \n\nMake sure you have access to the Internet and retry.
GrabSomeFood servers replied with a non successful status code (not 200). \n\nAre you connected to a WiFi network but with no Internet access?
Timeout. GrabSomeFood servers did not respond before the waiting time ended.
Out of memory. It looks like your device doesn\'t have enough memory to store all the map images.
It has not been possible to retrieve the image sent by GrabSomeFood servers.
GrabSomeFood servers have returned an incorrect or corrupted JSON file.
An internal error on the app has happened.
